hero.title: Professional UV/LED gel systems for modern nail brands
hero.subtitle: From high-performance gel polishes to advanced builder systems, we manufacture complete product lines you can rely on.

intro.title: Complete systems, not just single products
intro.text: We don't simply fill bottles. We design full, compatible systems – gel polishes, bases, tops, builders and accessories – that work together for long-lasting, salon-proof results.

gelPolish.title: Gel Polish Systems
gelPolish.text: High-pigment, self-levelling UV/LED gel polishes with a smooth application and consistent coverage. Available in hundreds of shades, from classic nudes to bold fashion colours, as well as glitters and speciality effects.
bullets: Compatible base and top systems for optimal adhesion and shine

builderGels.title: Builder & Structure Gels
builderGels.text: Builder, cover and strengthening gels designed for overlays, extensions and structured manicures. Formulated for control, durability and a comfortable wear for the client.
bullets: Cover tones, clear and milky shades
Suitable for natural nail strengthening and extensions

basesTops.title: Bases, Tops & Primers
basesTops.text: Adhesion-optimised bases, flexible rubber bases, gloss and matte top coats, and supportive primers designed to work seamlessly with our gel systems.

specialty.title: Speciality Gels & Effects
specialty.text: A selection of speciality products for nail art and advanced services, designed for brands that want to offer something more than a standard colour chart.
bullets: Special effect top coats and art gels

care.title: Supporting Products & Nail Care
care.text: Complementary liquids and treatments to complete your system and help professionals work efficiently and safely.
bullets: Cuticle oils and nail care support products

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing with consistency in mind
manufacturing.text: Every batch is produced under controlled conditions in our European facility, with documented processes and traceability. Our goal is simple: the shade you love today should look and behave the same tomorrow, and next year.
bullets: Full documentation available for private label partners

compliance.title: Compliance, safety and documentation
compliance.text: All products are developed and manufactured in line with EU Cosmetic Regulation (EC) 1223/2009. For private label clients, we support the documentation required for placing products on the European market.
bullets: PIF and CPNP support for private label projects
Formulas designed with long-term regulatory trends in mind

ctaSection.title: Looking for a custom range?
ctaSection.text: Whether you need a compact core range or an extended colour library, we can adapt our systems to your brand and target market.

gelPolishCategories.title: Explore Our Gel Polish Categories
gelPolishCategories.subtitle: Click on any category below to browse our complete range of gel polish products.

glittersCollection.title: Glitters Collection
glittersCollection.description: Sparkling glitter gel polishes with stunning effects

greenCollection.title: Green Collection
greenCollection.description: Fresh green shades for nature-inspired looks

solidColourCollection.title: Solid Colour Collection
solidColourCollection.description: Bold and vibrant pure color gel polishes

solidCreamCollection.title: Solid Cream Collection
solidCreamCollection.description: Creamy, opaque gel polishes with smooth coverage

transparentColorGelPolish.title: Transparent Color Gel Polish
transparentColorGelPolish.description: Translucent color gels for subtle effects

warmNudesCollection.title: Warm Nudes Collection
warmNudesCollection.description: Warm nude tones perfect for any occasion
